articles.author: Marilisa Di Maio
articles.description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! è stato uno dei tanti anime giapponesi che sono stati trasmessi da Italia Uno e ci hanno accompagnato durante la nostra adolescenza. Neanche questo prodotto, tratto dal manga di Kazuki Takahashi, è stato risparmiato dall’implacabile censura della televisione italiana che ha colpito anime come Rossana, Lady Oscar, Sailor Moon e tanti altri. Dal famoso… Leggi tutto »È stato ritrovato in mare il cadavere del creatore di Yu-Gi-Oh

articles.author: Davey Ferchow
articles.description:
The May 2022 most expensive list has arrived and it includes some essential punk releases, psychedelic rarities, and a hard-to-find CD maxi-single. Rare punk records start with a rare blue-green vinyl pressing of 7 Seconds’ The Crew. According to the Database, the pressing size is somewhere between 250 and 300 copies. An original pressing of Crow’s […]
The post Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in May 2022 appeared first on Discogs Blog.
articles.title: Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in May 2022

articles.author: Davey Ferchow
articles.description:
Vinyl has made plenty of headlines in recent years, but CDs also have quite a few stories to tell. As the second best-selling format on Discogs, CDs have continued to be a popular choice for collectors in the Marketplace. Billboard figures show that CDs recently saw their first sales increase in 17 years. Reputable brands […]
The post 3 Trends That Prove CDs are Making a Comeback appeared first on Discogs Blog.
articles.title: 3 Trends That Prove CDs are Making a Comeback
